refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: sl is a discrete linear system given by its state space representation (see syslin ):
refsection.programlisting: x[t+1] = A x[t] + B u[t] y[t] = C x[t] + D u[t]
refsection.para: or, more generally, if D is a polynomial matrix (p = degree(D(z))) :
y=flts(u,sl[,past]). Here sl is a linear system in transfer matrix representation i.e
is the matrix of past values of u and y.
nd is the maximum of degrees of lcm's of each row of the denominator matrix of sl.
refsection.programlisting: u=[u0 u1 ... un] (input) y=[y0 y1 ... yn] (output)
refsection.para: p is the difference between maximum degree of numerator and maximum degree of denominator
